1.title: Wilmington Mental Health
1.description: A comprehensive healthcare platform designed for a mental health clinic, featuring patient resources, service overviews, and streamlined contact options to facilitate accessible mental wellness support.

2.title: Wilmington Medical Care
2.description: A professional medical service website focused on patient trust and accessibility, providing clear information on primary care services, clinic locations, and provider expertise.

3.title: Galan Dental Care
3.description: A modern, responsive dental practice landing page built to showcase cosmetic and general dentistry services with a focus on high-quality visuals and user booking intent.

4.title: Marshalls Tailoring
4.description: An elegant digital presence for a bespoke tailoring service, highlighting craftsmanship, fabric selections, and the personalized consultation process.

5.title: Clairo Clone Website
5.description: A creative UI/UX experiment replicating the aesthetic and minimalist vibe of the artist Clairo's official site to practice layout precision and brand-thematic styling.

6.title: ThreadSpace
6.description: A concept social platform or forum space designed for community interaction, focusing on threaded conversations and a clean, user-centric interface.

7.title: Air Jordan
7.description: An e-commerce concept project exploring high-end product photography layouts, motion effects, and the iconic branding associated with the Jordan sneaker line.

8.title: Qr Maker
8.description: A lightweight, functional utility that allows users to instantly generate customizable QR codes for URLs, text, or contact information with a seamless export workflow.

9.title: Video Player
9.description: A custom-built media player featuring a sleek UI, playback controls, and optimized video rendering for a refined viewing experience across devices.
